    • Constructor Detail

      • RepairArea

        public RepairArea(int totalNumCars,
                  int rangeCarPartTypes,
                  int[] carParts,
                  int[] maxCarParts,
                  GeneralRepInformation gri)
        Instantiation of the Repair Area.
        Parameters:
        totalNumCars - number of the total number of cars
        rangeCarPartTypes - range of the IDs of car types
        carParts - array of number of carParts to be used. Index represents the ID of the car and value represents the number of parts available.
        maxCarParts - max stock possible for each car part. Index represents the ID of the part
        gri - General Repository Information to be used as logger

    • Method Detail

      • checkCar

        public int checkCar(int idCar,
                    int mechanicId)
        Checks the needed parts for the car to repair
        Parameters:
        idCar - - id of the car to check
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        the id of the part needed for repair

      • checkPartAvailability

        public boolean checkPartAvailability(int partId)
        Checks availability of car part
        Parameters:
        partId - - ID of the part.
        Returns:
        true if there are parts available. False otherwise.

      • repairCar

        public boolean repairCar(int carId,
                         int partId,
                         int mechanicId)
        Checks availability of car parts and if available repairs the car
        Parameters:
        carId - - The Id of car to repair.
        partId - - The id of the car part needed for the repair.
        mechanicId - - id of the mechanic doing the task
        Returns:
        true ready for repair. False otherwise
